title: Eve's Gift
description: Eve McIntyre is a young successful business woman yearning for that special someone to fill the void in her life. But, her fear of commitment prevents her from living the life she so desperately seeks.  Adam Winters is an rich, powerful, and sexy entrepreneur. The kind of man women would kill to have. But, Adam comes with baggage. A horrifying experience has turned him off to women for years.  Can Eve give Adam the love he needs to overcome the guilt he feels?  Can Adam break down the wall that Eve has built around her heart?
author: Nicole Garcia
